core

Class Delete

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.ActionBase
      • core.Delete

  • public class Delete
extends ActionBase
    Removes a plugin. Will remove the given plugin if he's present in the Coproplugins.properties file
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Fati CHEN

    • Method Detail

      • deletePlugin

        public static void deletePlugin(java.lang.String plugin_to_remove,
                                boolean debug)
        Will remove the given plugin, if the plugin is registered in the configuration file
        Parameters:
        plugin_to_remove - String The name of the plugin which needs to be removed, will be Converted to UPPERCASE
        debug - boolean Will display the progression of the action if true.

      • removeFromProperties

        protected static void removeFromProperties(java.lang.String line)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Will delete the given line from the configuration file.
        Parameters:
        line - String the line which need to be removed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the configuration file is not found

      • findPluginLine

        protected static java.lang.String findPluginLine(java.lang.String plugin)
                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                 PluginNotFoundException
        Will find the line from the configuration file for the given plugin name,
        Parameters:
        plugin - String the name of the plugin which line needs to be found, will be converted to UPPERCASE
        Returns:
        The line which contains the plugin name.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the configuration file is not found
        PluginNotFoundException - if the plugin name is not present in the configuration file
